bibl.title: Menander. Volume III. [Samia to Phasma.].
bibl.note: Volume II, 1996. - Includes a selection of papyrus fragments attributed to Menander.
bibl.seg: ARNOTT W. Geoffrey (Edited and Translated by), Menander. Volume III. [Samia to Phasma.]. (The Loeb Classical Library. 460.)
Cambridge, Mass. - London, Harvard University Press, 2000, 8°, 656 pp. ISBN 0-674-99584-8. £12.95.
Volume II, 1996. - Includes a selection of papyrus fragments attributed to Menander.

C.R. par Sander M. Goldberg, BMCRev < http://ccat.sas.upenn.edu/bmcr/2001/2001-05-16.html >. - Pierre Hamblenne, EtCl 69 (2001) p. 439. - Stanley Ireland, CR N.S., 52 (2002) pp. 153-154. - Herman Van Looy, AntCl 71 (2002) pp. 288-289.
